scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.lint: cd backend && flake8 app && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
